title: Natanz nuclear facility incident
description: Electrical grid failure at Natanz enrichment facility; widely attributed to sabotage.

title: Raisi elected president
description: Ebrahim Raisi wins presidential election amid low turnout.

title: Raisi sworn in
description: Ebrahim Raisi inaugurated as president; Rouhani presidency ends.

title: Khuzestan water protests
description: Protests erupt over water shortages and drought in Khuzestan and other regions.

title: Mahsa Amini protests begin
description: Nationwide protests begin following death of Mahsa Amini in custody.

title: Iranian internet restrictions announced
description: Authorities announce restrictions on internet access and social media platforms.

title: EU sanctions announcement
description: European Union announces sanctions on Iranian officials over protest crackdown.

title: First executions linked to protests
description: Iran executes first individuals charged in connection with protest-related offenses.

title: Iranian government anniversary statement
description: State-led commemorations mark anniversary of 1979 revolution.

title: Kerman bombings
description: Twin bombings at memorial event in Kerman kill dozens.

title: Iran-Israel escalation
description: Iran launches direct strikes on Israel; international responses follow.

title: Raisi helicopter crash
description: President Raisi and foreign minister killed in helicopter crash in northwest Iran.

title: Russia strategic partnership
description: Comprehensive strategic partnership treaty signed with Russia.

title: Tehran Palace of Justice shooting
description: Two Supreme Court judges assassinated in shooting; attacker committed suicide.

title: Bandar Abbas port explosion
description: Explosion at port kills 57 and injures over 1,000.

title: Ongoing unrest
description: Protests and domestic unrest continue into early 2026.
